body:
fixes https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/5173

p.s. @markcmiller86 in 39cb589510e95fa44ca634b2cdac9a56a34b1809 you extended `sundials` a bit and it looks like it worked for you on macOS. Could you please check if this PR does not break it for you?
title: dealii: add nanoflann, sundials and adol-c  plus fixes on macOS
